GE07bhg4c08u:1: arjuna uvāca kiṃ tad brahma kim adhyātmaṃ kiṃ karma puruṣottama |
GE07bhg4c08u:2: adhibhūtaṃ ca kiṃ proktam adhidaivaṃ kim ucyate ||1||
GE07bhg4c08u:5: ity uktaṃ brahma-karmādi spaṣṭam aṣṭama ucyate ||
GE07bhg4c08u:6: pūrvādhyāyānte bhagavatopakṣiptānāṃ brahmādhyātmādi-saptānāṃ padarthānāṃ tattvaṃ jijñāsur arjuna uvāca kiṃ tad brahmeti dvābhyām |
GE07bhg4c08u:8: madhusūdanaḥ - pūrvādhyāyānte te brahma tad viduḥ kṛtsnam adhyātmaṃ karma cākhilam ity ādinā sārdha-ślokena sapta-padārthā jñeyatvena bhagavatā sūtritās teṣāṃ vṛtti-sthānīyo 'yam aṣṭamo 'dhyāya ārabhyate |
GE07bhg4c08u:9: tatra sūtritāni sapta-vastūni viśeṣato bubhutsamānaḥ ślokābhyām |
GE07bhg4c08u:10: taj-jñeyatvenoktaṃ brahma kiṃ sopādhikaṃ nirupādhikaṃ vā |
GE07bhg4c08u:11: evam ātmānaṃ deham adhikṛtya tasminn adhiṣṭhāne tiṣṭhatīty adhyātmaṃ kiṃ
GE07bhg4c08u:13: tathā karma cākhilam ity atra kiṃ karma yajña-rūpam anyad vā vijñāntaṃ yajñaṃ tanute karmāṇi
GE07bhg4c08u:15: tava mama ca samatvāt kathaṃ tvaṃ māṃ pṛcchasīti śaṅkām apanudan
GE07bhg4c08u:16: sarva-puruṣebhya uttamasya sarvajñasya tava na kiṃcid ajñeyam iti saṃbodhanena sūcayati he puruṣottameti |
GE07bhg4c08u:17: adhibhūtaṃ ca kiṃ proktaṃ pṛthivyādibhūtam adhikṛtya yat kiṃcit kāryam adhibhūta-padena vivakṣitaṃ kiṃ vā samastam eva kārya-jātam |
GE07bhg4c08u:19: adhidaivaṃ kim ucyate devatā-viṣayam anudhyānaṃ vā sarvadaivateṣv ādiyta-maṇḍalādiṣv anusyūtaṃ caitanyaṃ vā ||1||
GE07bhg4c08u:22: śuddhāṃ ca bhaktiṃ provāca dve gatī api cāsṭame ||
GE07bhg4c08u:24: atra teṣāṃ tattvaṃ jijñāsuḥ pṛcchati dvābhyām |
GE07bhg4c08u:26: yajñādhiṣṭhātā, sa cāsmin dehe kathaṃ jñeya ity uttarasyānusaṅgī ||1-2||
GE07bhg4c08u:28: utkān pṛṣṭaḥ kramād vyākhyad brahmādīn harir aṣṭame |
GE07bhg4c08u:29: yoga-miśrāṃ ca śuddhāṃ ca bhakti-mārga-dvayaṃ tathā ||
GE07bhg4c08u:30: pūrvādhyāyānte mumukṣāṇāṃ jñeyatayoddiṣṭān brahmādīn saptārthān viboddhum arjunaḥ pṛcchati
GE07bhg4c08u:31: kiṃ tad brahmeti kiṃ paramātma-caitanyaṃ vā |
GE07bhg4c08u:34: kim adhyātmam iti ātmānaṃ deham adhikṛtyeti nirukteḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:35: śrotrādīndriya-vṛndaṃ vā sūkṣma-bhūta-vṛndaṃ vā tad iti |
GE07bhg4c08u:36: āvayos taulyāt kim iti māṃ pṛcchasīti śaṅkāṃ nivartayituṃ sambodhanaṃ he puruṣottameti |
GE07bhg4c08u:37: pareśatvāt tava sarvaṃ suviditaṃ na tu memeti bhāvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:38: adhibhūtaṃ ca kim iti bhūtāny adhikṛtyeti nirukter
GE07bhg4c08u:39: ghaṭyādi-kāryaṃ vā sthūla-śarīraṃ vā tad iti |
GE07bhg4c08u:41: devatā-viṣayakam anudhyānaṃ vā samaṣṭir virāṭ vā tad iti ||1||
GE07bhg4c08u:46: atra dehe you yajño nivartate tasmin ko 'dhiyajño 'dhiṣṭhātā |
GE07bhg4c08u:47: prayojakaḥ phala-dātā ca ka ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:48: svarūpaṃ pṛṣṭvādhiṣṭhāna-prakāraṃ pṛcchati - kathaṃ kena prakāreṇāsāv
GE07bhg4c08u:49: asmin dehe sthito yajñam adhitiṣṭhantīty arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:52: anta-kāle ca niyata-cittaiḥ puruṣaiḥ kathaṃ kenopāyena jñeyo 'si ||2||
GE07bhg4c08u:53: madhusūdanaḥ - adhiyajño yajñam adhigato devatātmā vā para-brahma vā |
GE07bhg4c08u:54: sa ca kathaṃ kena prakāreṇa cintanīyaḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:56: sarvathāpi sa kim asmin dehe vartate tato bahir vā |
GE07bhg4c08u:61: kintu saprakāra eka eva praśna iti draṣṭavyam |
GE07bhg4c08u:63: mat-sanehopadrava-nivāraṇam īṣatkaram ucitam eveti sūcayan sambodhayati he
GE07bhg4c08u:69: parama-kāruṇikatvāc ca śaraṇāgataṃ māṃ prati kathayety abhiprāyaḥ ||2||
GE07bhg4c08u:71: baladevaḥ - adhiyajñaḥ ka iti yajñam adhigata indrādir vā viṣṇur vā sa iti |
GE07bhg4c08u:72: katham iti tasyādhiyajña-bhāvaḥ katham ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:73: etat sarvaṃ mat-sandeha-nivāraṇaṃ taveṣatkaram iti bodhayituṃ sambodhanaṃ - he madhusūdaneti
GE07bhg4c08u:80: śrīdharaḥ - praśna-krameṇaivottaraṃ śrī-bhagavān uvāca akṣaram iti tribhiḥ
GE07bhg4c08u:83: paramaṃ yad akṣaraṃ jagato mūla-kāraṇaṃ tad braham |
GE07bhg4c08u:84: etad vai tad akṣaraṃ gārgi brāhmaṇā abhivadantīti śruteḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:87: sa evātmānaṃ deham adhikṛtya bhoktṛtvena vartamāno
GE07bhg4c08u:92: ādityāj jāyate vṛṣṭir vṛṣṭer annaṃ tataḥ prajā ||
GE07bhg4c08u:96: sarva-karmaṇām upalakṣaṇam etat sa ca karma-śabda-vācyaḥ ||3||
GE07bhg4c08u:97: madhusūdanaḥ - evaṃ saptānāṃ praśnānāṃ krameṇottaraṃ tribhiḥ ślokaiḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:98: praśna-krameṇa hi nirṇaye praṣṭur abhīṣṭa-siddhir anāyāsena syādity abhiprāyavān bhagavān atra śloke praśna-trayaṃ krameṇa nirdhāritavān |
GE07bhg4c08u:99: evaṃ dvitīya-śloke 'pi praśna-trayaṃ tṛtīya-śloke tv ekam iti vibhāgaḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:100: nirupādhikam eva brahmātra vivakṣitaṃ brahma-śabdena na tu sopādhikam iti
GE07bhg4c08u:101: prathama-praśnasyottaram āha - akṣaraṃ na kṣaratīty avināśi aśnute vā
GE07bhg4c08u:103: etad vai tad akṣaraṃ gārgi brāhmaṇā abhivadanty asthūlam anaṇu ity ādy upakramya etasya vā akṣarasya praśāsane gārgi sūryā-candramasau vidhṛtau tiṣṭhataḥ nānyad ato 'sti draṣṭṛ śrutir ityādi madhye parāmṛśya etasmin tu khalv akṣarae gārgy ākāśa otaś ca protaś ca ity upasaṃhṛtaṃ śrutyā |
GE07bhg4c08u:107: nirupādhikaṃ caitanyaṃ tad iha brahmeti vivakṣitam |
GE07bhg4c08u:110: sva-prakāśa-paramānanda-rūpaṃ praśāsanasya kṛtsna-jaḍa-varga-dhāraṇasya ca liṅgasya tatraivopapatteḥ
GE07bhg4c08u:113: chruti-liṅgādhikaraṇa-nyāya-mūlakena rūḍhir yogam apaharati iti nyāyena rathakāra-śabdena jāti-viśeṣavat-praṇavākhyam akṣaram eva grāhyaṃ
GE07bhg4c08u:115: om ity ekākṣaraṃ brahmeti ca pareṇa viśeṣaṇāt
GE07bhg4c08u:117: varṣāsu rathakāra ādadhīta ity atra tu jāti-viśeṣe nāsty asambhava iti viśeṣaḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:118: ananyathā-siddhena tu liṅgena śruter bādhaḥ ākāśas tal-liṅgāt ity ādau vivṛtaḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:121: yatra yogaḥ sambhavati tatra sa eva gṛhyate mukhyatvāt |
GE07bhg4c08u:122: yathājyaiḥ stuvate pṛṣṭaiḥ stuvata ity ādau |
GE07bhg4c08u:124: yatra tu yogo 'pi na sambhavati tatra gauṇī vṛttir yathākāśa-prāṇādi-śabdeṣu |
GE07bhg4c08u:125: ākāśa-śabdasyāpi brahmaṇi ā samantāt kāśata iti yogaḥ sambhavatīti cet |
GE07bhg4c08u:127: tathā ca parāmarṣaṃ sūtraṃ prasiddheś ca (Vs 1.3.17) iti |
GE07bhg4c08u:129: tad evaṃ kiṃ tad brahmeti nirṇītam |
GE07bhg4c08u:131: yad akṣaraṃ brahmety uktaṃ tasyaiva svabhāvaḥ svo bhāvaḥ svarūpaṃ
GE07bhg4c08u:132: pratyak-caitanyaṃ na tu svasya bhāva iti ṣaṣṭhī-samāsaḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:135: tasmān na brahmaṇaḥ saṃbandhi kintu brahma-svarūpam eva |
GE07bhg4c08u:136: ātmānaṃ deham adhikṛtya bhoktṛtayā vartamānam adhyātmam ucyate 'dhyātma-śabdenābhidhīyate
GE07bhg4c08u:138: yāga-dāna-homātmakaṃ vaidikaṃ karmaivātra karma-śabdena vivikṣitam iti tṛtīya-praśnottaram āha bhūtānāṃ bhavana-dharmakāṇāṃ sarveṣāṃ
GE07bhg4c08u:139: sthāvara-jaṅgamānāṃ bhāvam utpattim udbhavaṃ vṛddhiṃ ca karoti yo visargas tyāgasta-tac-chāstra-vihito yāga-dāna-homātmakaḥ sa iha karma-saṃjñitaḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:141: tatra devatoddeśena dravya-tyāgo yāga uttiṣṭhad dhomo vaṣaṭ-kāra-prayogāntaḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:149: ādityāj jāyate vṛṣṭir vṛṣṭer annaṃ tataḥ prajāḥ || iti smṛteḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:150: te vā ete āhutī hute utkrāmataḥ ity ādi śruteś ca ||3||
GE07bhg4c08u:152: na kṣaratīti akṣaraṃ nityaṃ yat paramaṃ tad brahma-- etad vai tad akṣaraṃ gārgi brāhmaṇā abhivadantīti śruteḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:153: svabhāvaḥ svātmānaṃ dehādhyāsa-vaśād bhāvayati janayatīti svabhāvaḥ jīvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:154: yad vā svaṃ bhāvayati paramātmānaṃ prāpayatīti svabhāvaḥ
GE07bhg4c08u:157: bhūtair eva bhāvānāṃ manuṣyādi-dehānām udbhavaṃ karotīti sa visargo jīvasya saṃsāraḥ karma-janyatvāt karma-saṃjñaḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:158: karma-śabdena jīvasya saṃsāra ucyata ity arthaḥ ||3||
GE07bhg4c08u:159: baladevaḥ - evaṃ pṛṣṭo bhagavān krameṇa saptānām uttaram āha akṣaram iti |
GE07bhg4c08u:160: na kṣaratīti nirkter akṣaraṃ yat paramaṃ dehādi-viviktaṃ jīvātma-caitanyaṃ
GE07bhg4c08u:163: ca-avyaktam akṣare līyate 'kṣaraṃ tamasi līyate tama ekībhavati parasminn iti vijñānaṃ brahma ced veda iti śruteḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:165: svasya jīvātmanaḥ sambandhī yo bhāvo bhūta-sūkṣma-tad-vāsanā-lakṣaṇa-padārthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:168: bhūteti teṣāṃ sūkṣmāṇāṃ bhūtānāṃ sthūlais taiḥ saṃpṛktānāṃ bhāvo manuṣyādi-lakṣaṇas tad-udbhava-karas tad-utpādako yo visargaḥ sa karma saṃjñitaḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:171: karma-śeṣo bhuvi manuṣyādi-deha-lābhāya visṛṣṭas tan mayā karmocyate |
GE07bhg4c08u:172: chāndogye dyu-parjanya-pṛthivī-puruṣa-yoṣitsu pañcasv agniṣu śraddhā-soma-vṛṣṭy-anna-retāṃsi kramāt pañcāhutayaḥ paṭhyante |
GE07bhg4c08u:173: tatrāyam arthaḥ - vaidiko jīva iha loke 'smayāni dadhy-ādīni śraddhayā juhoti |
GE07bhg4c08u:175: dadhy-ādimayyaḥ pañcīkṛtatvāt pañca-bhūta-rūpā āpaḥ śraddhayā hutatvāt
GE07bhg4c08u:177: atha tasmin mṛte tad-indriyādhiṣṭhātāro devās tā dyulokāgnau juhvati |
GE07bhg4c08u:179: hutāstāḥ soma-rājākhya-divya-dehatayā pariṇamante tena dehena sa tatra karma-phalāni bhuṅkte
GE07bhg4c08u:181: jīvavān dehais tair devaiḥ parjanyāgnau huto vṛṣṭir bhavati |
GE07bhg4c08u:183: tāḥ sajīvāḥ pṛthivy-agnau tair hutā brīhy-ādy-anna-bhāvaṃ labhante |
GE07bhg4c08u:184: anna-bhūtāḥ sajīvās tāḥ puruṣāgnau hutā reto-bhāvaṃ bhajante |
GE07bhg4c08u:186: sa-jīvās tā yoṣid-agnau tair hutā garbhātmanā sthitā manuṣya-bhāvaṃ
GE07bhg4c08u:188: evam evoktaṃ sūtrakṛtā tad-antara-pratipattau ity ādibhiḥ ||3||
GE07bhg4c08u:194: | bhūtaṃ prāṇi-mātram adhikṛtya bhavatīty adhibhūtam ucyate |
GE07bhg4c08u:195: puruṣo vairājaḥ sūrya-maṇḍala-madhyavartī svāṃśa-bhūta-sarva-devatānām adhipatir adhidaivatam ucyate |
GE07bhg4c08u:197: sa vai śarīrī prathamaḥ sa vai puruṣa ucyate |
GE07bhg4c08u:198: ādikartā sa bhūtānāṃ brahmāgre samavartata || iti śruteḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:201: katham ity asyāpy uttaram anenaivoktaṃ bhraṣṭavyam |
GE07bhg4c08u:205: dvā suparṇā sayujā sakhāyā samānaṃ vṛkṣaṃ pariṣasvajāte |
GE07bhg4c08u:206: tayor anyaḥ pippalaṃ svādv atty anaśnann anyo 'bhicākaśīti || [MuṇḍU 7.1.1]
GE07bhg4c08u:207: deha-bhṛtāṃ madhye śreṣṭheti sambodhayaṃs tvam apy evambhūtam antaryāmiṇaṃ
GE07bhg4c08u:209: madhusūdanaḥ - sampraty agrima-praśna-trayasyottaram āha adhibhūtam iti |
GE07bhg4c08u:210: kṣaratīti kṣaro vināśī bhāvo yat kiṃcij janimad vastu bhūtaṃ prāṇi-jātam
GE07bhg4c08u:212: puruṣo hiraṇyagarbhaḥ samaṣṭi-liṅgātmā vyaṣṭi-sarva-karaṇānugrāhakaḥ ātmaivedam agra āsīt
GE07bhg4c08u:213: puruṣavidhaḥ ity upakramya sa yat pūrvo 'smāt sarvasvmāt sarvān pāpmana
GE07bhg4c08u:216: sa vai śarīrī prathamaḥ sa vai puruṣa ucyate |
GE07bhg4c08u:219: adhidaivataṃ daivatāny ādityādīn adhikṛtya cakṣur-ādi-karaṇāny anugṛhṇātīti |
GE07bhg4c08u:222: viṣṇv-ākhyā devatā yajño vai viṣṇuḥ iti śruteḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:225: ataeva para-brahmaṇaḥ sakāśād atyantābhedenaiva pratipattavya iti katham iti vyākhyātam |
GE07bhg4c08u:226: sa cātrāsmin manuṣya-dehe yajña-rūpeṇa vartate buddhyādi-vyatirikto viṣṇu-rūpatvāt |
GE07bhg4c08u:227: etena sa kim asmin dehe tato bahir vā dehe cet ko 'tra buddhyādis tad vyatirikto veti sandeho nirastaḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:229: puruṣo vai yajñaḥ puruṣas tena yajño yad enaṃ puruṣas tanute ity ādi śruteḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:230: he deha-bhṛtāṃ vara sarva-prāṇināṃ śreṣṭheti sambodhayan pratikṣaṇaṃ
GE07bhg4c08u:231: mat-sambhāṣaṇāt kṛtakṛtyas tvam etad-bodha-yogyo 'sīti protsāhayaty arjunaṃ bhagavān |
GE07bhg4c08u:234: viśvanāthaḥ --- kṣaro naśvaro bhāvaḥ padārtho ghaṭa-paṭādir adhibhūtam
GE07bhg4c08u:236: adhikṛtya vartamānāni sūryādi-daivatāni yatra iti tan-nirukteḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:237: atra dehe 'dhiyajño yajñādi-karma-pravartako 'ntaryāmy ahaṃ mad-aṃśakatvād aham evety eva-kāreṇa kathaṃ jñeya ity asyottaram antaryāmitve 'ham eva
GE07bhg4c08u:238: mad-abhinnatve naiva jñeyo na tu adhyātmādir ive mad-bhinnatvenety arthaḥ
GE07bhg4c08u:239: | dehe deha-bhṛtāṃ vareti tvaṃ tu sākṣān mat-sakhatvāt sarva-śreṣṭha eva bhavasīti bhāvaḥ
GE07bhg4c08u:241: kṣaraḥ pratikṣaṇa-pariṇāmī bhāvaḥ sthūlo dehaḥ sa mayādhibhūtam it ucyate |
GE07bhg4c08u:243: puruṣaḥ samaṣṭi-virāṭ sa mayādhidaivam ity ucyate adhikṛtya vartamānāny
GE07bhg4c08u:245: atra dehe 'dhiyajño yajñam adhikṛtya vartata iti vyutpattes tat-pravartakas tat-phala-pradaś cāham eva |
GE07bhg4c08u:249: anena katham ity asyāpy uttaram uktaṃ
GE07bhg4c08u:251: tathā ca mad-arcā-sevanād etān brahmādīn saptārthān svarūpato ' śrameṇa vindatīti |
GE07bhg4c08u:254: anta-kāle ca mām eva smaran muktvā kalevaram |
GE07bhg4c08u:255: yaḥ prayāti sa madbhāvaṃ yāti nāsty atra saṃśayaḥ ||5||
GE07bhg4c08u:256: śrīdharaḥ - prayāṇa-kāle ca jñāyo 'sīty anena pṛṣṭam anta-kāle jñānopāyaṃ
GE07bhg4c08u:259: antaryāmi-rūpaṃ parameśvaraṃ smaran dehaṃ tyaktvā yaḥ prakarṣeṇārcir-ādi-mārgeṇottarāyaṇa-pathā yāti sa mad-bhāvaṃ mad-rūpatāṃ
GE07bhg4c08u:264: madhusūdanaḥ - idānīṃ prayāṇa-kāle ca kathaṃ jñeyo 'sīti saptamasya praśnasyottaram āha anta-kāle ceti |
GE07bhg4c08u:265: mām eva bhagavantaṃ vāsudevam adhiyajñaṃ sa-guṇaṃ nirguṇaṃ vā paramam akṣaraṃ brahma na tv adhyātmādikaṃ smaran sadā cintayaṃs tat-saṃskāra-pāṭavāt
GE07bhg4c08u:267: śarīre 'haṃ-mamābhimānaṃ tyaktvā prāṇa-viyoga-kāle yaḥ prayāti sa-guṇa-dhyāna-pakṣe 'gnijyotir-ahaḥ-śukla ity ādi-vacyamāṇena
GE07bhg4c08u:268: deva-yāna-mārgeṇa pitṛ-yāna-mārgāt prakarṣeṇa yāti sa upāsako mad-bhāvaṃ
GE07bhg4c08u:271: loka-dṛṣṭy-abhiprāyaṃ na tasya prāṇā utkrāmanty atraiva samavanīyante iti śrutes tasya prāṇotkramaṇābhāvena gaty-abhāvāt |
GE07bhg4c08u:272: sa mad-bhāvaṃ sākṣād eva yāti brahmaiva san brahmāpy eti (BAU 4.4.6) iti śruteḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:273: nāsty atra deha-vyatirikta ātmani mad-bhāva-prāptau vā saṃśayaḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:275: dehādy-atirikto na vā, deha-vyatireke 'pi īśvarād bhinno na veti sandeho na vidyate chidyante sarva-saṃśayāḥ (MuṇḍU 2.2.8) iti śruteḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:276: atra ca kalevaraṃ muktvā prayātīti dehād bhinnatvaṃ mad-bhāvaṃ yātīti ceśvarād abhinnatvaṃ jīvasyoktam iti draṣṭavyam ||5||
GE07bhg4c08u:277: viśvanāthaḥ --- prayāṇa-kāle kathaṃ jñeyo 'sīty asyottaram āha-anta-kāle
GE07bhg4c08u:279: mām eva smarann iti mat-smaraṇam eva maj-jñānam |
GE07bhg4c08u:280: na tu ghaṭa-paṭādir ivāhaṃ kenāpi tattvato jñātuṃ śakya iti bhāvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:282: baladevaḥ -- prayāṇa-kāle kathaṃ jñeyo 'sīty asyottaram āha-anteti |
GE07bhg4c08u:283: atra smaraṇātmakena jñānena jñeyo bhavan-mad-bhāvopalambhanaṃ ca tat phalaṃ
GE07bhg4c08u:290: yaṃ yaṃ vāpi smaran bhāvaṃ tyajaty ante kalevaram |
GE07bhg4c08u:291: taṃ tam evaiti kaunteya sadā tadbhāvabhāvitaḥ ||6||
GE07bhg4c08u:292: śrīdharaḥ - na kevalaṃ māṃ smaran mad-bhāvaṃ prāpnotīti niyamaḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:295: yaṃ yaṃ bhāvaṃ devatāntaraṃ vānyam api vānta-kāle
GE07bhg4c08u:296: smaran dehaṃ tyajati taṃ tam eva smaryamāṇaṃ bhāvaṃ prāpnoti |
GE07bhg4c08u:302: madhusūdanaḥ - anta-kāle bhagavantam anudhyāyato bhagavat-prāptir niyateti vaditum anyad api yatkiṃcid api yat kiṃcit tat-kāle dhyāyato dehaṃ tyajatas tat-prāptir avaśyambhāvinīti darśayati yaṃ yam iti |
GE07bhg4c08u:303: na kevalaṃ māṃ smaran mad-bhāvaṃ yātīti niyamaḥ kiṃ tarhi yaṃ yaṃ cāpi bhāvaṃ devatā-viśeṣaṃ ca-kārād anyad api yat kiṃcid vā smaraṃś cintayann ante prāṇa-viyoga-kāle kalevaraṃ tyajati sa taṃ tam eva smaryamāṇaṃ bhāvam eva
GE07bhg4c08u:306: tena cāvaśyānugrāhyatvaṃ tena ca pratāraṇāśaṅkā-śūnyatvam iti |
GE07bhg4c08u:308: smṛti-hetur ity āha - sadā sarvadā tasmin devatā-viśeṣādau bhāvo bhāvanā vāsanā tad-bhāvaḥ sa bhāvitaḥ sampādito yena sa tathā bhāvita-tad-bhāva
GE07bhg4c08u:311: tad-bhāvena tac-cintanena bhāvito vāsita-citta iti vā ||6||
GE07bhg4c08u:312: viśvanāthaḥ --- mām eva smaran māṃ prāpnotītivan mad-anyam api smaran mad-anyam eva prāpnotīty āha yaṃ yam iti |
GE07bhg4c08u:313: tasya bhāvena bhāvanenānucintanena bhāvito vāsitas tan-mayī-bhūtaḥ ||6||
GE07bhg4c08u:314: baladevaḥ - na ca mat-smarteiva mad-bhāvaṃ yātīti niyamaḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:316: anya-smartāpy anya-bhāvaṃ yātīty āha yaṃ yam iti |
GE07bhg4c08u:319: yathā bharato dehānte mṛgaṃ cintayan mṛgo 'bhūt |
GE07bhg4c08u:320: antima-smṛtiś ca pūrva-smṛti-viṣayaiva bhavatīty āha sadeti |
GE07bhg4c08u:323: tasmāt sarveṣu kāleṣu mām anusmara yudhya ca |
GE07bhg4c08u:325: śrīdharaḥ - yasmāt pūrva-vāsanaivānta-kāle smṛti-hetuḥ, na tu tadā
GE07bhg4c08u:328: satataṃ smaraṇaṃ ca citta-śuddhiṃ vinā na bhavati |
GE07bhg4c08u:332: evaṃ mayy arpitaṃ manaḥ saṅkalpātmakaṃ buddhiś ca vyavasāyātmikāyena tvayā sa tvaṃ māme va prāpsyasi |
GE07bhg4c08u:334: madhusūdanaḥ - yasmād evaṃ pūrva-smaraṇābhyāsa-janitāntyā bhāvanaiva tadānīṃ paravaśasya dehāntara-prāptau kāraṇaṃ tasmād iti |
GE07bhg4c08u:336: mad-viṣayakāntya-bhāvanotpatty-arthaṃ sarveṣu kāleṣu pūrvam evādareṇa māṃ saguṇam īśvaram anusmara cintaya |
GE07bhg4c08u:337: yady antaḥkaraṇāśuddhi-vaśān na śaknoṣi satatam anusmartuṃ tato 'ntaḥkaraṇa-śuddhaye yudhya ca |
GE07bhg4c08u:341: mayi bhagavati vāsudeve 'rpite saṅkalpādhyavasāya-lakṣaṇe mano-buddhī yena tvayā sa tvam īdṛśaḥ sarvadā mac-cintana-paraḥ san mām evaiṣyasi prāpsyasi
GE07bhg4c08u:346: tu jñāna-sama-kālam evājñāna-nivṛtti-lakṣaṇāyā mukteḥ siddhatvān nāsty
GE07bhg4c08u:350: baladevaḥ - yasmāt pūrva-smṛtir evāntima-smṛti-hetus tasmāt tvaṃ sarveṣu
GE07bhg4c08u:351: kāleṣu pratikṣaṇaṃ mām anusmara yudhyasva ca loka-saṅgrahāya yuddhādīni svocitāni karmāṇi kuru |
GE07bhg4c08u:352: evaṃ mayy arpitamanobuddhis tvaṃ mām evaiṣyasi,
GE07bhg4c08u:353: na tv anyad iy atra sandehas te mābhūt ||7||
GE07bhg4c08u:357: śrīdharaḥ - santata-smaraṇasya cābhyāso 'ntaraṅga-sādhanam iti darśayann āha abhyāsa-yogeneti
GE07bhg4c08u:361: ataeva nānyaṃ viṣayaṃ gantuṃ śīlaṃ yasya |
GE07bhg4c08u:363: divyaṃ dyotanātmakaṃ paramaṃ puruṣaṃ parameśvaram anucintayan he pārtha tam eva yātīti ||8||
GE07bhg4c08u:364: madhusūdanaḥ - tad evaṃ saptānām api praśnānām uttaram uktvā prayāṇa-kāle
GE07bhg4c08u:369: sa eva yogaḥ samādhis tena yuktaṃ tatraiva vyāpṛtam ātmākāra-vṛtti-śūnyaṃ yac cetas tena
GE07bhg4c08u:371: vināpi gantuṃ śīlam asyeti tena paramaṃ niratiśayaṃ puruṣaṃ pūrṇaṃ divyaṃ divi dyotanātmany āditye bhavaṃ yaś cāsāv āditye iti śruteḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:375: viśvanāthaḥ --- tasmāt smaraṇābhyāsina evānta-kāle svata eva mat-smaraṇaṃ
GE07bhg4c08u:377: tena ca māṃ prāpnotīty ataś cetaso mat-smaraṇam eva paramo yoga
GE07bhg4c08u:379: abhyāso mat-smaraṇasya punaḥ punar āvṛttir eva yogas tad-yuktena cetasā, ataeva nānyaṃ viṣayaṃ gantuṃ śīlaṃ yasya tena |
GE07bhg4c08u:381: baladevaḥ - sārvadikī smṛtir evāntima-smṛtikarīty evaṃ draḍhayati abhyāsenti |
GE07bhg4c08u:383: | tato 'nyatrācalatā tad ekāgreṇa cetasā divyaṃ puruṣaṃ paramaṃ sa-śrīkaṃ
GE07bhg4c08u:384: nārāyaṇaṃ vāsudevam anucintayan tam eva kīṭa-bhṛṅga-nyāyena tat-tulāḥ san yāti labhate ||8||
GE07bhg4c08u:386: kaviṃ purāṇam anuśāsitāram aṇor aṇīyāṃsam anusmared yaḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:389: śrīdharaḥ - punar apy anucintanīyaṃ puruṣaṃ viśinaṣṭi kavim iti dvābhyām |
GE07bhg4c08u:392: aṇoḥ sūkṣmād apy aṇīyāṃsaṃ atisūkṣmam ākāśa-kāla-digbhyo 'py atisūkṣmataram |
GE07bhg4c08u:395: vedāham etaṃ puruṣaṃ mahāntam āditya-varṇaṃ tamasaḥ parastāt iti śruteḥ
GE07bhg4c08u:396: madhusūdanaḥ - punar api tam evānucintayitavyaṃ gantavyaṃ ca puruṣaṃ viśinaṣṭi kavim iti |
GE07bhg4c08u:399: purāṇaṃ cirantanaṃ sarva-kāraṇatvād anādim iti yāvat |
GE07bhg4c08u:401: aṇor aṇīyāṃsaṃ sūkṣād apy ākāśādeḥ sūkṣmataraṃ
GE07bhg4c08u:403: sarvasya karma-phala-jātasya dhātāraṃ vicitratayā prāṇibhyo vibhaktāraṃ phalam ata upapatteḥ iti nyāyāt |
GE07bhg4c08u:404: na cintayituṃ śakyam aparimitam ahimatvena rūpaṃ yasya tam |
GE07bhg4c08u:406: sakala-jagad-avabhāsako varṇaḥ prakāśo yasya taṃ sarvasya jagato
GE07bhg4c08u:408: ataeva tamasaḥ parastāt tamaso mohāndhakārād ajñāna-lakṣaṇāt parastāt prakāśa-rūpatvena tamo-virodhinam iti yāvat |
GE07bhg4c08u:409: anusmarec cintayed yaḥ kaścid api sa taṃ yātīti pūrveṇaiva sambandhaḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:410: sa taṃ paraṃ puruṣam upaiti divyam iti pareṇa vā sambandhaḥ ||9||
GE07bhg4c08u:411: viśvanāthaḥ --- yogābhyāsaṃ vinā manaso viṣaya-grāmān nivṛttir durghaṭā |
GE07bhg4c08u:412: yac ca vinā sātatyena bhagavat-smaraṇam api durghaṭam iti yuktam |
GE07bhg4c08u:413: kenacit yogābhyāsena sahitaiva bhaktiḥ kriyata iti tāṃ yoga-miśrāṃ bhaktim āha kavim iti pañcabhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:414: kaviṃ sarvajñaṃ sarvajño 'py anyaḥ sanakādiḥ sārvakāliko na bhavaty ata āha purāṇam anādiṃ sarvajño 'nādir apy antaryāmī sa bhakty-upadeṣṭā na bhavaty ata āha anuśāsitāram |
GE07bhg4c08u:418: sudurvijñeya-tattva eva ity āha aṇoḥ sakāśād apy aṇīyāṃsam |
GE07bhg4c08u:419: tarhi sa kiṃ jīva iva paramāṇu-pramāṇas tatrāha sarvasya dhātāraṃ
GE07bhg4c08u:424: api tasyānanya-prakāśyatvam āha āditya-varṇam ādityavat sva-para-prakāśako
GE07bhg4c08u:426: tathā tamasaḥ prakṛteḥ parastāt vartamānaṃ māyā-śaktimantam api māyātīta-svarūpam ity arthaḥ
GE07bhg4c08u:427: baladevaḥ - yogād ṛte cetaso 'nanya-gāmitā duṣkareti yoga-miśrāṃ bhaktim āha kavim ity ādibhiḥ pañcabhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:431: aṇor aṇīyāṃsaṃ tena cāṇum api jīvam antaḥ praviśatīti siddham |
GE07bhg4c08u:432: āha caivaṃ śrutiḥ antaḥ praviṣṭaḥ śāstā janānām iti |
GE07bhg4c08u:435: nanu katham evaṃ saṅgacchate tatrāha acintya-rūpaṃ avitarkya-svarūpaṃ ekam eva brahma puruṣa-vidhatvena madhyama-parimāṇam aṇor aṇīyāṃsam ity ukteḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:444: etādṛśaṃ puruṣaṃ yo 'nukṣaṇaṃ smaret sa taṃ paraṃ puruṣam upaiti iti pareṇānvayaḥ ||9||
GE07bhg4c08u:446: prayāṇa-kāle manasācalena bhaktyā yukto yoga-balena caiva |
GE07bhg4c08u:447: bhruvor madhye prāṇam āveśya samyak sa taṃ paraṃ puruṣam upaiti divyam ||10||
GE07bhg4c08u:450: evaṃbhūtaṃ puruṣam anta-kāle bhakti-yukto niścalena vikṣepa-rahitena
GE07bhg4c08u:453: yoga-balena samyak suṣumṇā mārgeṇa bhruvor madhye prāṇam āveśyeti |
GE07bhg4c08u:456: madhusūdanaḥ - kadā tad-anusmaraṇe pratrātireko 'bhyavartate tad āha prayāneti |
GE07bhg4c08u:459: kīdṛśaḥ bhaktyā parameśvara-viṣayeṇa parameṇa premṇā yuktaḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:463: vaśīkṛtya tata ūrdhva-gāminyā suṣumṇayā nāḍyā gurūpadiṣṭa-mārgeṇa
GE07bhg4c08u:464: bhūmi-jaya-krameṇa bhruvor madhye ājñā-cakre prāṇam āveśya sthāpayitvā
GE07bhg4c08u:465: samyag apramatto brahma-randhrād utkrāmya sa evam upāsakas taṃ kaviṃ
GE07bhg4c08u:466: purāṇam anuśāsitāram ity-ādi-lakṣaṇaṃ paraṃ puruṣaṃ divyaṃ dyotanātmakam upaiti pratipadyate
GE07bhg4c08u:473: baladevaḥ -- yo jano bhaktyā paramātma-premṇā yoga-balena
GE07bhg4c08u:477: bhruvor madhye ājñā-cakre prāṇam āveśya saṃsthāpya samyak sāvadhānaḥ san sa taṃ puruṣam upaiti ||10||
GE07bhg4c08u:479: yad akṣaraṃ vedavido vadanti viśanti yad yatayo vītarāgāḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:480: yad icchanto brahmacaryaṃ caranti tat te padaṃ saṃgraheṇa pravakṣye ||11||
GE07bhg4c08u:481: śrīdharaḥ - kevalād abhyāsa-yogād api praṇavā̆bhyāsam antaraṅgaṃ vidhitsuḥ pratijānīte-yad akṣaram iti |
GE07bhg4c08u:483: etasya vā akṣarasya praśāsane gārgi sūryācandramasau vidhṛtau tiṣṭhata iti śruteḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:486: yac ca jñātum icchanto gurukule brahmacaryaṃ caranti |
GE07bhg4c08u:487: tat te tubhyaṃ padaṃ padyate gamyata iti padaṃ prāpyam |
GE07bhg4c08u:490: madhusūdanaḥ - idānīṃ yena kenacid abhidhānena dhyāna-kāle
GE07bhg4c08u:492: sarve vedā yatpadamāmananti tapāṃsi sarvāṇi ca yadvadanti |
GE07bhg4c08u:493: yadicchanto brahmacaryaṃ caranti tatte padaṃ saṃgraheṇa bravīmy om ity etat || (KaṭhaU 1.2.15)
GE07bhg4c08u:495: kartavyaṃ nānyena mantrādineti niyantum upakramate yad akṣaram iti |
GE07bhg4c08u:496: yad akṣaram avināśi oṅkārākhyaṃ brahma veda-vido vadanti etad vai tad akṣaraṃ gārgi brāhmaṇā abhivadanty asthūlam aṇv ahrasvam adīrgham ity ādi-vacanaiḥ
GE07bhg4c08u:498: pramāṇa-kuśalair eva pratipannaṃ kiṃ tu muktopasṛpyatayā tair apy anubhūtam ity āha-viśanti
GE07bhg4c08u:499: samyag-darśanena yad akṣaraṃ yatayo yatna-śīlāḥ saṃnyāsino vīta-rāgā
GE07bhg4c08u:501: na kevalaṃ siddhair anubhūtaṃ sādhakānām api sarvo 'pi
GE07bhg4c08u:502: prayāsas tad-artha ity āha yad-icchanto jñātuṃ naiṣṭhikā brahmacāriṇo
GE07bhg4c08u:503: brahmacaryaṃ gurukula-vāsādi-tapaś caranti yāvaj-jīvaṃ tad akṣarākhyaṃ padaṃ padanīyaṃ te tubhyaṃ saṅgraheṇa saṅkṣepeṇāhaṃ pravakṣye prakarṣeṇa kathayiṣyāmi yathā tava bodho bhavati tathā |
GE07bhg4c08u:504: atas tad akṣaraṃ kathaṃ mayā jñeyam ity ākulo mā bhūr ity abhiprāyaḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:505: atra ca parasya brahmaṇo vācaka-rūpeṇa pratimāvat-pratīka-rūpeṇa ca yaḥ punar etaṃ trimātreṇom ity aneaivākṣareṇa paraṃ puruṣam abhidhyāyīta sa
GE07bhg4c08u:507: krama-mukti-phalakam upāsanam uktaṃ tad evehāpi vivakṣitaṃ bhagavatā |
GE07bhg4c08u:509: yoga-dhāraṇā-sahitam oṅkāropāsanaṃ tat phalaṃ sva-svarūpaṃ tato
GE07bhg4c08u:510: 'punar-āvṛttis tan-mārgaś cety artha-jātam ucyate yāvad adhyāya-samāpti
GE07bhg4c08u:511: viśvanāthaḥ --- nanu bhruvor madhye prāṇam āveśya ity etāvan mātroktyā yogo na jñāyate, tasmāt tatra yoge prakāraḥ kaḥ, kiṃ japyaṃ, kiṃ vā dhyeyam, kiṃ vā prāpyam ity api saṅkṣepeṇa brūhīty apekṣāyām āha yad iti tribhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:512: yad evākṣaram om ity ekākṣara-vācyaṃ brahma yatayo viśanti tat padaṃ padyate gamyata iti padaṃ prāpyam |
GE07bhg4c08u:514: saṅgrahas tad-upāyas tena saha pravakṣye śṛṇu ||11||
GE07bhg4c08u:515: baladevaḥ -- nanu bhruvor madhye prāṇam āveśyaitāvatā yogo nāvagamyate,
GE07bhg4c08u:516: tasmāt tasya prakāraṃ tatra japyaṃ prāpyaṃ brūhīty apekṣāyām āha yad akṣaram iti tribhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:517: ekam eva brahma akṣaram om iti vācakaṃ vadanti |
GE07bhg4c08u:518: vīta-rāgā vinaṣṭāvidyā yatayo yad brahma tad-vācya-bhūtaṃ vijñānaika-rasaṃ
GE07bhg4c08u:522: tat padaṃ prāpyaṃ saṅgraheṇopāyena saha pravakṣye vakṣyāmi yathānāyasena tvaṃ tad-vidyāṃ
GE07bhg4c08u:524: samyag gṛhyate tattvam anena iti nirukteḥ saṅgraha upāyaḥ ||11||
GE07bhg4c08u:526: sarva-dvārāṇi saṃyamya mano hṛdi nirudhya ca |
GE07bhg4c08u:528: om ity ekākṣaraṃ brahma vyāharan mām anusmaran |
GE07bhg4c08u:529: yaḥ prayāti tyajan dehaṃ sa yāti paramāṃ gatim ||13||
GE07bhg4c08u:530: śrīdharaḥ - pratijñātam upāyaṃ sāṅgam āha dvābhyāṃ sarveti |
GE07bhg4c08u:537: mūrdhni bhruvor madhye prāṇam ādhāya yogasya dhāraṇāṃ sthairyam āsthitaḥ āśritavān san ||12||
GE07bhg4c08u:539: om ity ekaṃ yad akṣaraṃ tad eva brahma-vācakatvād vā pratimādivad brahma-pratīkatvād vā brahma |
GE07bhg4c08u:540: tad-vyāharan uccārayaṃs tad-vācyaṃ ca mām anusmarann eva dehaṃ tyajan yaḥ prakarṣeṇa yāti arcirādi-mārgeṇa sa paramāṃ śreṣṭhāṃ gatiṃ mad-gatiṃ yāti prāpnoti ||13||
GE07bhg4c08u:541: madhusūdanaḥ - tatra pravakṣya iti pratijñātam arthaṃ sopakaraṇam āhaa dvābhyām sarva-dvārāṇīti
GE07bhg4c08u:545: bāheyndriya-nirodhe 'pi manasaḥ pracāraḥ syād ity ata āha mano hṛdi nirudhya ca, abhyāsa-vairāgyābhyāṃ ṣaṣṭhe vyākhyātābhyāṃ hṛdaya-deśe mano nirudhya nirvṛttikatām āpādya ca, antar api viṣaya-cintām akurvann ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:546: evaṃ bahir antar upalabdhi-dvārāṇi sarvāṇi saṃnirudhya kriyā-dvāraṃ prāṇam api sarvato nigṛhya bhūmi-jaya-krameṇa mūrdhny ādhāya bhruvor madhye tad-upari ca gurūpadiṣṭa-mārgeṇāveśyātmano yoga-dhāraṇām
GE07bhg4c08u:549: om ity ekam akṣaraṃ brahma-vācakatvāt pratimā-baddha-brahma-pratīkatvād vā brahma vyāharann uccaran |
GE07bhg4c08u:550: om iti vyāharann ity etāvataiva nirvāha ekākṣaram ity anāyāsa-kathanena stuty-artham |
GE07bhg4c08u:551: om iti vyāharann ekākṣaram ekam advitīyam akṣaram avināśi sarva-vyāpakaṃ brahma mām om ity asyārthaṃ smarann iti vā |
GE07bhg4c08u:552: tena praṇavaṃ japaṃs tad-abhidheya-bhūtaṃ ca māṃ cintayan
GE07bhg4c08u:553: mūrdhanyayā nāḍyā dehaṃ tyajanyaḥ prayāti sa yāti deva-yāna-mārgeṇa
GE07bhg4c08u:554: brahma-lokaṃ gatvā tad-bhogānte paramāṃ prakṛṣṭāṃ gatiṃ mad-rūpām |
GE07bhg4c08u:555: atra patañjalinā tīvra-saṃvegānām āsannaḥ (Ys 1.21) samādhi-lābhaḥ ity uktvā īśvara-praṇidhānād vā (1.23) ity uktam |
GE07bhg4c08u:556: praṇidhānaṃ ca vyākhyātaṃ tasya vācakaḥ praṇavaḥ (1.27), taj-japas tad-artha-bhāvanam (1.28) iti |
GE07bhg4c08u:558: iha tu sākṣād eva tataḥ parama-gati-lābha ity uktam |
GE07bhg4c08u:559: tasmād avirodhayom ity ekākṣaraṃ brahma vyāharan mām anusmarann ātmano yoga-dhāraṇām āsthita iti vyākhyeyam |
GE07bhg4c08u:561: viśvanāthaḥ --- uktam arthaṃ vadan yoge prakāram āha sarvāṇi
GE07bhg4c08u:562: cakṣur-ādīndriya-dvārāṇi saṃyamya bāhya-viṣayebhyaḥ pratyāhṛtya manaś ca
GE07bhg4c08u:563: hṛdy eva nirudhya viṣayāntareṣv asaṅkalpya mūrdhni bhruvor madhye eva prāṇam ādhāya yoga-dhāraṇām ānakha-śikha-man-mūrti-bhāvanām āśritaḥ san om
GE07bhg4c08u:564: ity ekākṣaraṃ brahma-svarūpaṃ vyāharan uccārayan tad-vācyaṃ mām anusmarann anudhyāyan paramāṃ gatiṃ mat-sālokyam ||12-13||
GE07bhg4c08u:567: śrotrādīni saṃyamya śabdādibhyo viṣayebhyaḥ pratyāhṛtya doṣa-darśanābhyāsena tad-vimukhais tais tān gṛhṇan śrotrādi-saṃyame 'pi
GE07bhg4c08u:568: manaḥ pracared ity ata āha hṛdi sthite mayi antar-jñāna-dvāraṃ mano nirudhya niveśya manasāpi tān smaran |
GE07bhg4c08u:569: atha kriyā-dvāraṃ prāṇaṃ ca mūrdhnādhāyādau hṛt-padme vaśīkṛtya tasmād ūrdhva-gatayā suṣumṇayā
GE07bhg4c08u:571: brahma-randhre ca saṃsthāpya ātmano mama yoga-dhāraṇām āāda-śikhaṃ
GE07bhg4c08u:573: om iti vācakaṃ brahma tatra vyāharan antar uccārayan tat stauti ekākṣaram iti ekaṃ pradhānaṃ ca tad-akṣaram avināśi ceti tathā tad vācyaṃ māṃ
GE07bhg4c08u:574: parmātmānam anusmaran dhyāyan yo dehaṃ tyajan prayāti sa paramāṃ gatiṃ
GE07bhg4c08u:577: ananya-cetāḥ satataṃ yo māṃ smarati nityaśaḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:579: śrīdharaḥ - evaṃ cānta-kāle dhāraṇayā mat-prāptir nityābhyāsavata eva bhavati |
GE07bhg4c08u:583: yo māṃ satataṃ nirantaraṃ nityaśaḥ pratidinaṃ smarati |
GE07bhg4c08u:586: madhusūdanaḥ - ya evaṃ vāyu-nirodha-vaidhuryeṇa prāṇam āveśya mūrdhanyayā
GE07bhg4c08u:587: nāḍyā dehaṃ tyaktuṃ svecchayā na śaknoti kiṃ tu karma-kṣayeṇaiva paravaśo dehaṃ tyajati tasya kiṃ syād iti tad āha ananya-cetā iti |
GE07bhg4c08u:588: na vidyate mad-anya-viṣaye ceto yasya so 'nanya-cetāḥ satataṃ nirantaraṃ nityaśo
GE07bhg4c08u:589: yāvaj-jīvaṃ yo māṃ smarati tasya sva-vaśatayā vā dehaṃ tyajato 'pi
GE07bhg4c08u:590: nitya-yuktasya satata-samāhita-cittasya yoginaḥ sulabhaḥ sukhena labhyo
GE07bhg4c08u:591: 'haṃ parameśvara itareṣām atidurlabho 'pi he pārtha tavāham atisulabho mā bhaiṣīr ity abhiprāyaḥ
GE07bhg4c08u:595: satatam iti nairantaryaṃ nityaśa iti dīrgha-kālatvaṃ smaraṇasyoktam |
GE07bhg4c08u:597: dīrgha-kāla-nairantarya-satkārāsevito dṛḍha-bhūmiḥ (Ys 1.14) iti pātañjalaṃ matam anusṛtaṃ bhavati |
GE07bhg4c08u:601: bhagavad-anucintanam eva parama-gati-hetur mūrdhanyayā nāḍyā tu svecchayā prāṇotkramaṇaṃ bhavatu na veti nātīvāgrahaḥ ||14||
GE07bhg4c08u:602: viśvanāthaḥ --- tad evam ārtaḥ ity ādinā karma-miśrām,
GE07bhg4c08u:603: jaarā-maraṇa-mokṣāya ity anenāpi karma-miśrām, kaviṃ purāṇaṃ ity ādibhir
GE07bhg4c08u:604: yoga-miśrāṃ ca saparikarāṃ pradhānībhūtāṃ bhaktim uktvā sarva-śreṣṭhāṃ
GE07bhg4c08u:609: tathā svargāpargādāv api prāpyatvena ceto yasya |
GE07bhg4c08u:610: satataṃ sadeti kāla-deśa-pātra-śuddhy-ādy-anapekṣatayaiva nityaśaḥ pratidinam eva yo māṃ smarati, yasya tena bhaktenāhaṃ sulabhaḥ sukhena labhyaḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:613: nitya-mad-yogākāṅkṣiṇa āśaṃsāyāṃ bhūtavac ceti bhāviny api yoga āśāṃsite
GE07bhg4c08u:618: baladevaḥ - evaṃ mokṣa-mātra-kāṅkṣiṇāṃ yoga-miśrāṃ bhaktim upadiśya sva-jñānināṃ svam evākāṅkṣatām eka-bhaktir ity uktāṃ śuddhāṃ bhaktiṃ upadiśati ananyeti |
GE07bhg4c08u:620: sādhane svarga-mokṣādike sādhye vā ceto yasya sa mad-ekābhilāṣavān satataṃ sarvadā deśa-kālādi-viśuddhi-nairapekṣeṇa nityaśaḥ pratyahaṃ māṃ
GE07bhg4c08u:621: yaśodā-stanandhayaṃ nṛsiṃha-raghunāthādi-rūpeṇa bahudhāvirbhūtaṃ sarveśvaram atimātra-priyaṃ smaraty arcana-japādiṣv anusandhatte tasyāhaṃ tat-prītijñaḥ sulabhaḥ sukhena labhyaḥ
GE07bhg4c08u:624: sambandha-sāmānye ṣaṣṭhī, na lokāvyaya ity ādinā kartari tasyāḥ
GE07bhg4c08u:626: tādṛśasya tasya viyogam asahiṣṇur aham eva tam ātmānaṃ darśayāmi tat-sādhana-paripākaṃ tat-pratikūla-nirāsaṃ ca kurvan |
GE07bhg4c08u:627: śrutiś caivam āha - yam evaiṣa vṛnute tena labhyas tasyaiṣa ātmā viviṛṇute tanūṃ
GE07bhg4c08u:629: svayaṃ ca vakṣyati - dadāmi buddhi-yogaṃ taṃ yena mām upayānti te ity ādinā |
GE07bhg4c08u:631: sarvadā mad-yogaṃ vāñchataḥ āśaṃsāyāṃ bhūtavac ca iti sūtrād āśāṃsite yoge bhaviṣyaty api
GE07bhg4c08u:635: mām upetya punar janma duḥkhālayam aśāśvatam |
GE07bhg4c08u:637: śrīdharaḥ - yady evaṃ tvaṃ sulabho 'si tataḥ kiṃ ? ata āha mām iti |
GE07bhg4c08u:638: ukta-lakṣaṇā mahātmāno mad-bhaktā māṃ prāpya punar duḥkhāśrayam antiyaṃ ca
GE07bhg4c08u:640: yatas te paramāṃ samyak siddhiṃ mokṣam eva prāptāḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:641: punar janmano duḥkhānāṃ cālayaṃ sthānaṃ te mām upetya na prāpnuvantīti vā ||15||
GE07bhg4c08u:642: madhusūdanaḥ - bhagavantaṃ prāptāḥ punar āvartante na veti sandehe nāvartanta ity āha mām iti |
GE07bhg4c08u:643: mām īśvaraṃ prāpya punar janma manuṣyādi-deha-sambandhaṃ kīdṛśaṃ duḥkhālayaṃ garbha-vāsa-yoni-dvāra-nirgamanādy-aneka-duḥkha-sthānam
GE07bhg4c08u:644: aśāśvatam asthiraṃ dṛṣṭa-naṣṭa-prāyaṃ nāpnuvanti punar nāvartanta ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:646: samutpanna-samyag-darśanā mal-loka-bhogānte paramāṃ sarvotkṛṣṭāṃ saṃsiddhiṃ muktiṃ gatās te |
GE07bhg4c08u:647: atra māṃ prāpya siddhiṃ gatā iti vadatopāsakānāṃ krama-muktir darśitā ||15||
GE07bhg4c08u:648: viśvanāthaḥ --- tvāṃ prāptavatas tasya kiṃ syād ity āha mām iti |
GE07bhg4c08u:650: aśāśvatam anityaṃ ca janma nāpnuvanti kintu
GE07bhg4c08u:652: śāśvatas tu dhruvo nityaḥ sadānanaḥ sanātanaḥ ity amaraḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:654: nitya-bhūtam aprākṛtaṃ maj-janma bhavet tad eva teṣāṃ mad-bhaktānām api
GE07bhg4c08u:655: man-nitya-saṅgināṃ janma syān nānyadā iti bhāvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:656: paramām iti anye bhaktāḥ saṃsiddhiṃ prāpnuvanti ananya-cetasas tu paramāṃ saṃsiddhiṃ
GE07bhg4c08u:660: baladevaḥ -- tāṃ labdhavataḥ kiṃ phalaṃ syād ity apekṣāyām āha mām iti |
GE07bhg4c08u:661: mām ukta-lakṣaṇam upetya prāpya punaḥ prapañce janma nāpnuvanti nāvartanta ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:665: śāśvatas tu dhruvo nityaḥ ity amaraḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:666: yatas te paramāṃ sarvotkṛṣṭāṃ saṃsiddhiṃ gatiṃ mām eva gatā labdhavantaḥ avyakto 'kṣara ity uktas tam
GE07bhg4c08u:669: vijñānānanda-nidhiṃ bhakta-prasādābhimukhaṃ bhaktāyatta-sarvasvaṃ māṃ vinānyat sārṣṭyādikam agaṇayanto made-eka-jīvātavo bhavanty atas te mām eva saṃsiddhiṃ gatāḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:674: mām upetya tu kaunteya punar-janma na vidyate ||16||
GE07bhg4c08u:675: śrīdharaḥ - sarva eva jīvā mahā-sukṛtino 'pi jāyante |
GE07bhg4c08u:676: mad-bhaktās tu tadvan na jāyanta ity āha ā-brahmeti |
GE07bhg4c08u:679: kathitāyāṃ tato vimukhānām asamyag-darśināṃ punar-āvṛttir artha-siddhety
GE07bhg4c08u:681: ābrahma-bhuvanāt bhavanty atra bhūtānīti bhuvanaṃ lokaḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:685: brahma-bhavanād iti pāṭhe bhavanaṃ vāsa-sthānam iti sa evārthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:688: kiṃ tadvad eva tvāṃ prāptānām api punar āvṛttir nety āha mām īśvaram ekam upetya tu |
GE07bhg4c08u:690: mām eva prāpya nirvṛttānāṃ he kaunteya mātṛto 'pi prasiddha-mahānubhāva
GE07bhg4c08u:691: punar-janma na vidyate punar-āvṛttir nāstīty arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:692: atrārjuna kaunteyeti sambodhana-dvayena svarūpataḥ kāraṇataś ca śuddhir jñāna-saṃpattaye
GE07bhg4c08u:695: prāptās teṣām eva tatrotpanna-samyag-darśanānāṃ brahmaṇā saha mokṣaḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:696: ye tu pañcāgni-vidyādibhir atat-kratavo 'pi tatra gatās teṣām avaśyambhāvi
GE07bhg4c08u:698: ataeva krama-mukty-abhiprāyeṇa brahma-lokam abhisampadyate na ca punar āvartate, anāvṛttiḥ śabdāt iti śruti-sūtrayor upapattiḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:699: itaratra teṣām iha na punar āvṛttiḥ imaṃ mānavam āvartaṃ nāvartante itīhemam iti ca viśeṣaṇād gamanādhikaraṇa-kalpād anyatra punar āvṛttiḥ
GE07bhg4c08u:701: viśvanāthaḥ --- sarva eva jīvā mahā-sukṛtino 'pi jāyante mad-bhaktās tu tavan na jāyanta ity āha ābrahmeti |
GE07bhg4c08u:703: baladevaḥ - mad-vimukhās tu karma-viśeṣaiḥ svargādi-lokān prāptā api tebhyaḥ patantīty āha ābrahmeti |
GE07bhg4c08u:706: tat-tad-vartino jīvās tat-tat-karma-kṣaye sati punar āvartino bhūmau punar janma labhante
GE07bhg4c08u:708: atredaṃ bodhyaṃ pañcāgni-vidyayā mahāhava-maraṇādinā ye brahma-lokaṃ gatās teṣāṃ bhogānte pātaḥ syāt |
GE07bhg4c08u:710: krameṇānubhavantas tatra gatās teṣāṃ tu na tasmāt pātaḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:713: brahmaṇā saha te sarve samprāpte pratisañcare |
GE07bhg4c08u:714: parasyānte kṛtātmānaḥ praviśanti paraṃ padam || iti smaraṇād iti ||16||
GE07bhg4c08u:718: śrīdharaḥ - nanu ca tapasvino dāna-śīlā vīta-rāgās titikṣavaḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:722: vināśitve ca sarveṣām avaśiṣṭe katham asau viśeṣaḥ syād ity āśaṅkya bahv-alpa-kāla-sthāyitva-nimitto 'sau viśeṣa ity āśayena sva-mānena
GE07bhg4c08u:723: śata-varṣāyuṣo brahmaṇo 'hany ahani trilokya utpattiḥ niśi niśi ca pralayo bhavatīti darśayiṣyan brahmaṇo 'horātrayoḥ pramāṇam āha sahasreti |
GE07bhg4c08u:724: sahasraṃ yugāni paryanto 'vasānaṃ ysya tad brahmaṇo yad ahas tad ye viduḥ yuga-sahasram anto yasyās tāṃ rātriṃ ca yoga-balena ye vidus ta eva sarvajñā janā aho-rātra-vidaḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:729: atra caturyugam abhipretaṃ caturyuga-sahasraṃ tu brahmaṇo dinam ucyate iti viṣṇu-purāṇokteḥ
GE07bhg4c08u:732: manuṣyāṇāṃ yad varṣaṃ tad devānām aho-rātram |
GE07bhg4c08u:736: tāvat parimāṇaiva rātris tādṛśair aho-rātraiḥ pakṣa-māsādi-krameṇa
GE07bhg4c08u:738: madhusūdanaḥ - brahma-loka-sahitāḥ sarve lokāḥ punar āvartinaḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:744: caturyuga-sahasraṃ tu brahmaṇo dinam ucyate iti hi paurāṇikaṃ vacanam |
GE07bhg4c08u:745: tādṛśaṃ brahmaṇaḥ prajāpater ahar-dinaṃ yad ye viduḥ tathā rātriṃ yuga-sahasrāntāṃ caturyuga-sahasra-paryantāṃ ye vidur ity
GE07bhg4c08u:746: anuvartate te 'horātra-vidas ta evāho-rātra-vido yogino janāḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:747: ye tu candrārka-gatyaiva vidus te nāhorātra-vidaḥ svalpa-darśitvād ity abhiprāyaḥ ||17||
GE07bhg4c08u:748: viśvanāthaḥ --- nanu amṛtaṃ kṣemam abhayaṃ trimūrdhno 'dhāyi mūrdhasu (BhP
GE07bhg4c08u:751: sannyāsibhir api jagamiṣitatvāt tatratyānāṃ pāto na sambhāvyate ? maivaṃ |
GE07bhg4c08u:753: utānyeṣām iti vyañjayann āha sahasra iti |
GE07bhg4c08u:755: 'vasānaṃ yasya tad brahmaṇo 'har dinaṃ yad ye śāstrābhijñā vidur jānanti
GE07bhg4c08u:756: te 'ho-rātra-vido janā rātrim api tasya yuga-sahasrāntāṃ viduḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:758: tādṛśāho-rātraiḥ pakṣam āsādi-krameṇa varṣa-śataṃ brahmaṇaḥ paramāyur iti
GE07bhg4c08u:759: | etad-ante tasyāpi pāto na kasyacid vaiṣṇavasya tasya brahmaṇo mokṣaś ceti vyañjitam ||17||
GE07bhg4c08u:760: baladevaḥ - svargādayaḥ satyāntāḥ sarve lokāḥ kāla-paricchinnatvād
GE07bhg4c08u:762: yad ye brahmaṇaś caturmukhasyāhar dinaṃ nṛ-māṇena sahasra-yuga-paryantaṃ viduḥ catur-yuga-sahasraṃ tu brahmaṇo dinam ucyate iti smṛteḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:764: tasya rātriṃ ca caturyuga-sahasrāntāṃ vidus ta eva yogino janā aho-rātra-vido bhavanti
GE07bhg4c08u:767: ayam arthaḥ nṝṇāṃ varṣaṃ devānām aho-rātraṃ tādṛśair aho-rātraiḥ pakṣam āsādi-gaṇanayā
GE07bhg4c08u:768: varṣa-sahasraiś catur-yugaṃ catur-yugānāṃ sahasraṃ tu brahmaṇo dinaṃ rātriś ca tāvaty eva tādṛśaiś cāho-rātraiḥ pakṣādi-gaṇanayā varṣa-śataṃ
GE07bhg4c08u:770: tad-ante tal-lokasya tad-vartināṃ ca vināśād āvṛttiḥ
GE07bhg4c08u:775: śrīdharaḥ - tatra kim ? ata āha avyaktād iti |
GE07bhg4c08u:777: tasmād avyaktāt kāraṇa-rūpād vyajyanta iti vyaktayaś
GE07bhg4c08u:785: kintu te prasiddhā ahorātra-vido janā brahmaṇo yad ahar vidus tasyāhna āgame 'vyaktād vyaktayaḥ prabhavanti |
GE07bhg4c08u:786: yāṃ ca rātriṃ vidus tasyā rātrer āgame pralīyante iti dvayor anvayaḥ ||18||
GE07bhg4c08u:787: madhusūdanaḥ - yathoktair aho-rātraiḥ pakṣam āsādi-gaṇanayā pūrṇaṃ
GE07bhg4c08u:790: ye tu tato 'rvācīnās teṣāṃ tad ahar-mātra-paricchinnatvāt tat-tal-lokebhyaḥ punar-āvṛttir iti kim u
GE07bhg4c08u:792: atra dainandina-sṛṣṭi-pralayor eva vaktum upakrāntatvāt tatra cākāśādīnāṃ sattvād avyakta-śabdenākhyākṛtāvasthā
GE07bhg4c08u:800: svāpa-kāle pūrvoktāḥ sarvā api vyaktayaḥ pralīyante tiro-bhavanti yata āvirbhūtās tatraivāvyakta-saṃjñake kāraṇe prāg-ukte svāpāvasthe prajāpatau ||18||
GE07bhg4c08u:801: viśvanāthaḥ --- ye tu tato 'rvācīnās triloka-sthās teṣāṃ tu tasyāhany
GE07bhg4c08u:802: ahany api pāta ity āha avyaktād iti |
GE07bhg4c08u:804: ākāśādīnāṃ sattvād avyakta-śabdena svāpāvasthaḥ prajāpatir evocyate iti
GE07bhg4c08u:806: tataś ca avyaktāt svāpāvasthāt prajāpateḥ sakāśād vyaktayaḥ śarīra-viṣayādi-rūpā bhoga-bhūmayo
GE07bhg4c08u:808: rātry-āgame tasya svāpa-kāle pralīyante tasminn eva tirobhavanti ||18||
GE07bhg4c08u:809: baladevaḥ -- ye tu tasmād arvācīnās trilokī-vartinas teṣāṃ brahmaṇo dine
GE07bhg4c08u:810: pātaḥ syād ity āha avyaktād iti |
GE07bhg4c08u:814: rātry-āgame tasya svāpa-samaye tatraiva brahmaṇy avyakta-saṃjñake svāpāvasthe kāraṇe tāḥ pralīyante tirobhavanti |
GE07bhg4c08u:820: bhūta-grāmaḥ sa evāyaṃ bhūtvā bhūtvā pralīyate |
GE07bhg4c08u:822: śrīdharaḥ - atra ca kṛta-nāśākṛtābhyāgama-śaṅkāṃ vārayan vairāgyārthaṃ sṛṣṭi-praylaya-pravāhasyāvicchedaṃ darśayati bhūta-grāma iti |
GE07bhg4c08u:826: yaḥ prāg āsīt sa evāyam ahar-āgame
GE07bhg4c08u:827: bhūtvā bhūtvā rātrer āgame pralīyante pralīya pralīya punar apy ahar-āgame
GE07bhg4c08u:828: 'vaśaḥ karmādi-paratantraḥ san prabhavati nānya ity arthaḥ ||19||
GE07bhg4c08u:829: madhusūdanaḥ - evam āśu-vināśitve 'pi saṃsāra-stha na nivṛttiḥ kleśa-karmādibhir avaśatayā punaḥ punaḥ prādurbhāvāt prādurbhūtasya ca
GE07bhg4c08u:831: saṃsāre viparivartamānānāṃ sarveṣām api prāṇinām asvātantryād avaśānām eva janma-maraṇādi-duḥkha-prabandha-sambandhād alam anena saṃsāreṇeti-vairāgyotpatty-arthaṃ samāna-nāma-rūpatvena ca punaḥ punaḥ
GE07bhg4c08u:833: bhūta-grāmo bhūta-samudāyaḥ sthāvara-jaṅgama-lakṣaṇo yaḥ pūrvasmin kalpe
GE07bhg4c08u:834: sthitaḥ sa evāyam etasmin kalpe jāyamāno 'pi na tu pratikalpam anyo 'nyac
GE07bhg4c08u:838: divaṃ ca pṛthivīṃ cāntarikṣam atho suvaḥ || iti śruteḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:840: samāna-nāma-rūpatvād āvṛttāv apy avirodhau darśanāt smṛteś ca (Vs 1.3.30)
GE07bhg4c08u:844: viśvanāthaḥ --- evam eva bhūtānāṃ carācara-prāṇināṃ grāmaḥ samūhaḥ ||19||
GE07bhg4c08u:845: baladevaḥ - ye pralīnās te punar na bhaviṣyantīti
GE07bhg4c08u:846: kṛta-hānyākṛtābhyāgama-śaṅkā syāt tāṃ nirasyann āha bhūteti |
GE07bhg4c08u:849: cedṛśa-janma-mṛtyu-pravāha-saṅkule prapañce 'smin vivekināṃ vairāgyaṃ yuktam ity uktam
GE07bhg4c08u:852: yaḥ sa sarveṣu bhūteṣu naśyatsu na vinaśyati ||20||
GE07bhg4c08u:853: śrīdharaḥ - lokānām anityatvaṃ prapañcya parameśvara-svarūpasya nityatvaṃ prapañcayati - para iti dvābhyām |
GE07bhg4c08u:854: tasmāc carācara-kāraṇa-bhūtād avyaktāt paras tasyāpi kāraṇa-bhūto yo 'nyas tad-vilakṣaṇo 'vyaktaś
GE07bhg4c08u:857: kārya-kāraṇa-lakṣaṇeṣu bhūteṣu naśyatv api na vinaśyati ||20||
GE07bhg4c08u:859: lokāḥ punar āvartina ity etad vyākhyātam adhunā mām upetya punar janma na vidyata ity etad vyācaṣṭe dvābhyāṃ paras tasmād iti |
GE07bhg4c08u:863: vyatireke 'pi sālakṣaṇyaṃ syād iti nety āha-anyo 'tyanta-vilakṣaṇaḥ na tasya pratimā asti iti śruteḥ
GE07bhg4c08u:864: | avyakto rūpādi-hīnatayā cakṣur-ādy-agocaro bhāvaḥ kalpiteṣu sarveṣu
GE07bhg4c08u:867: tu-śabdo heyād anityād avyaktād upādeyatvaṃ ntiyasyāvyaktasya vailakṣaṇyaṃ sūcayati |
GE07bhg4c08u:868: etādṛśo yo bhāvaḥ sa hiraṇyagarbha iva sarveṣu bhūteṣu naśyatsv api na vinaśyati utpadyamāneṣv api notpadyata ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:869: hiraṇyagarbhasya tu kāryasya bhūtābhimānitvāt tad-utpatti-vināśābhyāṃ yuktāv evotpatti-vināśau
GE07bhg4c08u:871: viśvanāthaḥ --- tasmād ukta-lakṣaṇād avyaktāt prajāpater hiraṇyagarbhāt
GE07bhg4c08u:873: hiraṇyagarbhasyāpi kāraṇabhūto yo 'nyaḥ khalv avyakto bhāvaḥ sanātano 'nādiḥ ||20||
GE07bhg4c08u:876: atha mām upetyaitad vivṛṇoti paras tasmād iti |
GE07bhg4c08u:877: tasmād utka-rūpād avyaktād brahmaṇo hiraṇyagarbhād anyo yo bhāvaḥ padārthaḥ paraḥ śreṣṭhas tato 'tyanta-vilakṣaṇas tasyopāsya ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:880: prasāditas tu pratyakṣo 'pi bhavatīty uktaṃ prāk |
GE07bhg4c08u:883: sa khalu hiraṇyagarbha-paryanteṣu sarveṣu bhūteṣu na vinaśyati
GE07bhg4c08u:885: avyakto 'kṣara ity uktas tam āhuḥ paramāṃ gatim |
GE07bhg4c08u:886: yaṃ prāpya na nivartante tad dhāma paramaṃ mama ||21||
GE07bhg4c08u:887: śrīdharaḥ - avināśe pramāṇaṃ darśayann āha avyakta iti |
GE07bhg4c08u:891: tathākṣarāt saṃbhavatīha viśvaṃ ity ādi-śrutiṣv akṣara ity uktaḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:892: taṃ paramāṃ gatiṃ gamyaṃ puruṣārtham āhuḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:893: puruṣān na paraṃ kiṃcit sā kāṣṭhā sā parā gatiḥ
GE07bhg4c08u:895: parama-gatitvam evāha yaṃ prāpya na nivartanta iti |
GE07bhg4c08u:899: | ato 'ham eva paramā gatir ity arthaḥ ||21||
GE07bhg4c08u:900: madhusūdanaḥ - yo bhāva ihāvyakta ity akṣara iti cokto 'nyatrāpi śrutiṣu smṛtiṣu ca taṃ bhāvam āhuḥ śrutayaḥ smṛtayaś ca puruṣān na paraṃ kiṃcit sā kāṣṭhā paramā gatiḥ ity ādyāḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:904: yaṃ bhāvaṃ prāpya na punar nivartante saṃsārāya
GE07bhg4c08u:905: tad-dhāma svarūpaṃ mama viṣṇoḥ paramaṃ sarvotkṛṣṭam |
GE07bhg4c08u:906: mama dhāmeti rāhoḥ śira itivad bheda-kalpanayā ṣaṣṭhī |
GE07bhg4c08u:907: ato 'ham eva paramā gatir ity arthaḥ ||21||
GE07bhg4c08u:908: viśvanāthaḥ --- pūrvokta-ślokoktam avyakta-śabdaṃ vyācaṣṭe avyakta iti |
GE07bhg4c08u:909: na kṣaratīty akṣaro nārāyaṇaḥ eko nārāyaṇa āsīn na brahmā na ca śaṅkaraḥ iti śruteḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:911: yad vā akṣaraḥ paraṃ dhāma brahmaiva mad-dhāma mat-tejo-rūpam ||21||
GE07bhg4c08u:912: baladevaḥ -- yo bhāvo mayehāvyakta ity akṣara iti cocyate taṃ vedāntāḥ
GE07bhg4c08u:913: paramāṃ gatim āhuḥ puruṣān na paraṃ kiṃcit sā kāṣṭhā paramā gatiḥ ity ādau
GE07bhg4c08u:914: | yaṃ bhāvaṃ prāpyopetya janāḥ punar na nivartante janma nāpnuvanti sa bhāvo 'ham evety āha tad iti |
GE07bhg4c08u:915: tan mamaiva dhāma svarūpaṃ paramaṃ śrīmat ṣaṣṭhīyaṃ caitanyam ātmanaḥ svarūpam itivad avagantavyā
GE07bhg4c08u:917: puruṣaḥ sa paraḥ pārtha bhaktyā labhyas tv ananyayā |
GE07bhg4c08u:918: yasyāntaḥ-sthāni bhūtāni yena sarvam idaṃ tatam ||22||
GE07bhg4c08u:919: śrīdharaḥ - tat-prāptau ca bhaktir antaraṅgopāya ity uktam evety āha puruṣa iti |
GE07bhg4c08u:921: na vidyate 'nyaḥ śaraṇatvena yasyāṃ tayaikānta-bhaktyaiva labhyaḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:927: madhusūdanaḥ - idānīm ananya-cetāḥ satataṃ yo māṃ smarati nityaśaḥ tasyāhaṃ sulabhaḥ iti prāg uktaṃ bhakti-yogam eva tat-prāpty-upāyam āha puruṣa sa iti |
GE07bhg4c08u:928: sa paro niratiśayaḥ puruṣaḥ paramātmāham evānanyayā na vidyate 'nyho viṣayo yasyāṃ tayā prema-lakṣaṇayā bhaktyaiva labhyo nānyathā |sa ka ity apekṣāyām āha yasya purusasyāntaḥ-sthāny antarvartīni bhūtāni sarvāṇi kāryāṇi kāraṇāntarvartitvāt kāryasya |
GE07bhg4c08u:929: ataeva yena puruṣeṇa sarvam idaṃ kārya-jātaṃ tataṃ vyāptam -
GE07bhg4c08u:930: yasmāt paraṃ nāparam asti kiṃcid yasmān nāṇīyo na jyāyo 'sti kaścit |
GE07bhg4c08u:931: vṛkṣa eva stabdho divi tisṭhaty ekas tenedaṃ pūrṇaṃ puruṣeṇa sarvam |
GE07bhg4c08u:932: yat kiṃcit jagat sarvaṃ dṛśyate śrūyate 'pi vā |
GE07bhg4c08u:933: antar bahiś ca tat sarvaṃ vyāpya nārāyaṇaḥ sthitaḥ ||
GE07bhg4c08u:935: viśvanāthaḥ --- sa ca mad-aṃśaḥ paramaḥ puruṣaḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:940: baladevaḥ -- at-prāptau bhakteḥ sūpāyatvam āha puruṣaḥ sa iti |
GE07bhg4c08u:942: mal-lakṣaṇaḥ puruṣo 'nanyayā tad-ekāntayā ananya-cetāḥ satatam iti pūrvoditayā bhaktyaiva labhyo labdhuṃ śakyo yoga-bhaktyā tu duḥśakyā tat-prāptir ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:944: sarvam idaṃ jagat yena tataṃ vyāptam |
GE07bhg4c08u:946: eko vaśī sarvagaḥ kṛṣṇa īḍya eko 'pi san bahudhā yo 'vabhāti |
GE07bhg4c08u:947: vṛkṣa iva stabdho divi tiṣṭhaty ekas tenedaṃ pūrṇaṃ puruṣeṇa sarvam || ity ādyā ||22||
GE07bhg4c08u:949: yatra kāle tv anāvṛttim āvṛttiṃ caiva yoginaḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:950: prayātā yānti taṃ kālaṃ vakṣyāmi bharatarṣabha ||23||
GE07bhg4c08u:951: śrīdharaḥ - tad evaṃ paramśvaropāsakās tat-padaṃ prāpya na nivartante |
GE07bhg4c08u:956: yatra yasmin kāle prayātā yogino 'nāvṛttiṃ yānti yasmiṃś ca kāle prayātā āvṛttiṃ yānti taṃ
GE07bhg4c08u:958: atra ca raśmy-anusārī ataś cāyane 'pi dakṣiṇe iti sūcita-nyāyenottarāyaādi-kāla-viśeṣa-maraṇaṃ ca tv avivakṣitatvāt
GE07bhg4c08u:959: kāla-śabdena kālābhimāninībhir ātivāhikībhir devatābhiḥ prāpyo mārga upalakṣyate |
GE07bhg4c08u:960: ato 'yam arthaḥ yasmin kālābhimāni-devatopalakṣite mārge prayātā yogina upāsakāḥ karmiṇaś ca yathākramam anāvṛttim āvṛttiṃ ca yānti |
GE07bhg4c08u:964: tat-sāhacaryād āmra-vanam ity ādivat kāla-śabdenopalakṣaṇam aviruddham
GE07bhg4c08u:965: madhusūdanaḥ - saguṇa-brahmopāsakās tat-padaṃ prāpya na nivartante kintu krameṇa mucyante
GE07bhg4c08u:967: tesāṃ mārgāpekṣā vidyate na tu samyag-darśinām iva tad-anapekṣety
GE07bhg4c08u:970: prāṇotkramaṇānantaraṃ yatra yasmin kāle kālābhimāni-devatopalakṣite mārge prayātā yogino dhyāyinaḥ karmiṇaś cānāvṛttim āvṛttiṃ ca yānti |
GE07bhg4c08u:972: pathi prayātāś ca karmiṇa āvṛttiṃ yānti |
GE07bhg4c08u:973: yadyapi deva-yāne 'pi pathi prayātāḥ punar āvartante ity uktaṃ ābrahma-bhuvanā lokāḥ punar
GE07bhg4c08u:974: ity atra, tathāpi pitṛ-yāne pathi gatā āvartanta eva na ke 'pi tatra
GE07bhg4c08u:976: deva-yāne pathi gatās tu yadyapi kecid āvartante
GE07bhg4c08u:978: amānava-puruṣa-nītā api pañcāgni-vidyādy-upāsakā atat-kratavo bhogānte nivartanta eva tathāpi daharādy-upāsakāḥ krameṇa mucyante |
GE07bhg4c08u:982: ayaṃ tu deva-yānaḥ panthā anāvṛtti-phalatvād atipraśasta iti stutir upapadyate keṣāṃcid āvṛttāv apy anāvṛtti-phalatvasyānapāyāt |
GE07bhg4c08u:983: taṃ deva-yānaṃ pitṛ-yānaṃ ca kālaṃ kālābhimāni-devatopalakṣitaṃ mārgaṃ vakṣyāmi |
GE07bhg4c08u:988: agni-dhūmayos tad-itarayoḥ sator api agnihotra-śabdavad eka-deśenāpy upalakṣaṇaṃ kāla-śabdena
GE07bhg4c08u:989: anyathā prātar agni-devatāyā abhāvāt tat-prakhyaṃ cānya-śāstram (ṃī.da 1.4.4) ity anena tasya nāma-dheyatayā na syāt |
GE07bhg4c08u:991: viśvanāthaḥ --- nanu yaṃ prāpya na nivartante tad dhāma paramaṃ mama iti
GE07bhg4c08u:992: tva-uktyā tvad-bhaktās tvāṃ prāptā na punar āvartanta ity uktam |
GE07bhg4c08u:993: na tatra tva-prāntau kaścin mārga-niyama ity uktaḥ |tvad-bhaktānāṃ ca guṇātītatvāt tan-mārgo 'pi guṇātīta eva avasīyate, na tu sāttviko 'rcir-ādiḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:994: yas tu mārgo yogino jñāninaḥ karmiṇaś cāsti tam ahaṃ jijñāse ity apekṣāyām āha yatreti
GE07bhg4c08u:995: prāṇotkramaṇānantaraṃ tatra kālopalakṣite mārge prayātā anāvṛttim āvṛttiṃ ca yānti taṃ kālaṃ mārgaṃ vakṣya ity anvayaḥ ||23||
GE07bhg4c08u:996: baladevaḥ -- sva-bhaktānām āvṛttiḥ sva-vimukhānāṃ tv āvṛttir uktā |
GE07bhg4c08u:997: sā sā ca kena pathā gatānāṃ bhaved ity apekṣāyām āha yatreti |
GE07bhg4c08u:1000: agni-dhūmayoḥ kālatvābhāvāt kāla-śabdenoktis tu bhūyasā mahad-ādi-śabdānāṃ
GE07bhg4c08u:1001: rātry-ādi-śabdānāṃ ca kāla-vācitvāt tathā cārcir-ādibhir dhūmādibhiś ca devaiḥ pālitaḥ panthāḥ kāla-śabdenokto bodhyaḥ ||23||
GE07bhg4c08u:1003: agnir jyotir ahaḥ śuklaḥ ṣaṇmāsā uttarāyaṇam |
GE07bhg4c08u:1004: tatra prayātā gacchanti brahma brahma-vido janāḥ ||24||
GE07bhg4c08u:1013: evaṃ bhūto yo mārgas tatra prayātā gatā bhagavad-upāsakā janā brahma prāpnuvanti |
GE07bhg4c08u:1015: tathā ca śrutiḥ - te 'rciṣam abhi sambhavanti arciṣo 'rahna āpūryamāṇa-pakṣam āpūryamāṇa-pakṣād yān ṣaṇ-māsānudaṅṅāditya
GE07bhg4c08u:1018: samyag-darśana-niṣṭhānāṃ gatir vā kvacid asti, na tasya prāṇā utkrāmanti
GE07bhg4c08u:1019: madhusūdanaḥ - tatropāsakānāṃ deva-yānaṃ panthānam āha agnir iti |
GE07bhg4c08u:1020: agnir-jyotir ity arcir abhimāninī devatā lakṣyate |
GE07bhg4c08u:1021: ahar ity ahar-abhimāninī śukla-pakṣa iti śukla-pakṣābhimāninī ṣaṇ-māsā uttarāyaṇam iti uttarāyaṇa-rūpa-ṣaṇmāsābhimāninī devataiva lakṣyate ātivāhikās
GE07bhg4c08u:1025: tathā ca śrutiḥ - te 'rciṣam abhi sambhavanti arciṣo 'rahna āpūryamāṇa-pakṣam āpūryamāṇa-pakṣād yān ṣaḍ-uṅṅeti māsāṃs tān māsebhyaḥ saṃvatsaraṃ saṃvatsarād ādityam ādityāc candramasaṃ candramaso vidyutaṃ tat-puruṣo 'mānavaḥ sa enān brahma gamayaty eṣa deva-patho brahma-patha etena pratipadyamānā imaṃ mānavam āvartaṃ nāvartante iti |
GE07bhg4c08u:1027: vāyu-devatā tata āditya ity ākare nirṇītam |
GE07bhg4c08u:1032: vāyur ādityaś candramā vidyud-varuṇa indraḥ prajāpatiś cety anuktā api draṣṭavyāḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:1033: tatra deva-yāna-mārge prayātā gacchanti brahma kāryopādhikaṃ kāryaṃ vādarir asya gaty-upapatteḥ (Vs 4.3.7) iti nyāyāt |
GE07bhg4c08u:1037: atra etena pratipadyamānā imaṃ mānavam āvartaṃ nāvartanta iti śrutāv imam iti viśeṣaṇāt kalpāntare kecid āvartanta iti pratīyate |
GE07bhg4c08u:1046: etad-rūpo yo mārgas tatra prayātā brahma-vido jñānino brahma prāpnuvanti |
GE07bhg4c08u:1047: tathā ca śrutiḥ - te 'rciṣam abhi sambhavanti arciṣo 'rahna āpūryamāṇa-pakṣam
GE07bhg4c08u:1048: āpūryamāṇa-pakṣād yān ṣaṇ-māsānudaṅṅāditya eti mālebhyo deva-lokam iti
GE07bhg4c08u:1052: ahar iti divasābhimānī śukla iti śukla-pakṣābhimāninī |
GE07bhg4c08u:1057: chāndogyāḥ paṭhanti - atha yad u caivāsmin śavyaṃ kurvanti yadi ca nārciṣam evābhisaṃbhavanty arciṣo 'haraha
GE07bhg4c08u:1058: āpūryamāṇa-pakṣam āpūryamāṇa-pakṣādyān ṣaḍ-udaṇṇeti māsāṃs tān māsebhyaḥ
GE07bhg4c08u:1059: saṃvatsaraṃ saṃvatsarād ādityam ādityāc candramasaṃ candramaso vidyutaṃ tat puruṣo 'mānavaḥ sa enān brahma gamayaty eṣa deva-patho brahma-patha
GE07bhg4c08u:1060: etena pratipadyamānā imaṃ mānavam āvartaṃ nāvartanta iti |
GE07bhg4c08u:1061: asyārthaḥ - asminn akṣi-stha-brahmopāsaka-gaṇe mṛte sati yadi
GE07bhg4c08u:1062: putra-śiṣyādayaḥ śabyaṃ śaba-sambandhi karma dāhādi kurvanti |
GE07bhg4c08u:1065: devais tam upāsyaṃ prayāntīti sphuṭam anyat |
GE07bhg4c08u:1075: bhagavan-nideśa-sthair dvādaśabhir devaiḥ sevyamānena pathā bhagavantaṃ tad-bhaktāḥ prayānti tataḥ punar nāvartanta iti |
GE07bhg4c08u:1078: vidhu-vidyud-varuṇndra-druhiṇaiś cāgāt padaṃ harer muktaḥ || iti ||24||
GE07bhg4c08u:1080: dhūmo rātris tathā kṛṣṇaḥ ṣaṇmāsā dakṣiṇāyanam |
GE07bhg4c08u:1081: tatra cāndramasaṃ jyotir yogī prāpya nivartate ||25||
GE07bhg4c08u:1086: etābhir devatābhir upalakṣito yo mārgas tatra prayātaḥ
GE07bhg4c08u:1087: karma-yogī cāndramasaṃ jyotis tad-upalakṣitaṃ svarga-lokaṃ prāpya
GE07bhg4c08u:1090: dhūmam abhi sambhavanti dhūmād rātriṃ rātrer apakṣīyamāṇa-pakṣam
GE07bhg4c08u:1091: apakṣīyamāṇa-pakṣād yān ṣaṇmāsān dakṣiṇāditya eti māsebhyaḥ pitṛ-lokaṃ
GE07bhg4c08u:1092: pitṛ-lokāt candraṃ te candraṃ prāpya annaṃ bhavanti iti |
GE07bhg4c08u:1093: tad evaṃ nivṛtti-karma-sahitopāsanayā krama-muktiḥ kāmya-karmabhiś ca
GE07bhg4c08u:1097: kṣudra-karmaṇāṃ tu jantūnām atraiva punaḥ punar janmeti
GE07bhg4c08u:1099: madhusūdanaḥ - deva-yāna-mārgastuty-arthaṃ pitṛ-yāna-mārgam āha dhūma iti
GE07bhg4c08u:1100: | atrāpi dhūma iti dhūmābhimāninī devatā rātrir iti rātry-abhimāninī kṛṣṇa iti kṛṣṇa-pakṣābhimāninī
GE07bhg4c08u:1101: ṣaṇmāsā dakṣiṇāyanam iti dakṣiṇāyanābhimāninī lakṣyate etad apy anyāsāṃ śruty-uktānām upalakṣaṇam
GE07bhg4c08u:1103: te dhūmam abhi sambhavanti dhūmād rātriṃ rātrer apara-pakṣam
GE07bhg4c08u:1104: apara-kṣīyamāṇa-pakṣād yān ṣaḍ-dakṣiṇaiti māsāṃs tān anite saṃvatsaram abhiprāpnuvanti māsebhyaḥ pitṛ-lokaṃ pitṛ-lokād ākāśam ākāśāc candramasam
GE07bhg4c08u:1105: eṣa somo rājā tad-devānām annaṃ taṃ devā bhakṣayanti tasmin yāvat saṃpātam uṣitvāthaitam evādhvyānaṃ punar nivartante iti |
GE07bhg4c08u:1106: tatra tasmin pathi prayātāś cāndramasaṃ jyotiḥ phalaṃ yogī karma-yogīṣṭāpūrta-datta-kārī
GE07bhg4c08u:1109: | tasmād etasmād āvṛtti-mārgād anāvṛtti-mārgaḥ śreyān ity arthaḥ ||25||
GE07bhg4c08u:1110: viśvanāthaḥ --- karmiṇām āvṛtti-mārgam āha dhūma iti |
GE07bhg4c08u:1112: rātry-ādi-śabdaiś ca pūrvavad eva tat-tad-abhimāninyas tisro devatā lakṣyante |
GE07bhg4c08u:1113: etābhir devatābhir upalakṣito yo mārgas tatra prayātaḥ
GE07bhg4c08u:1114: karma-yogī cāndramasaṃ jyotis tad-upalakṣitaṃ svarga-lokaṃ prāpya
GE07bhg4c08u:1116: baladevaḥ - athāvṛtti-patham āha dhūmo rātrir iti |
GE07bhg4c08u:1119: chāndogyāḥ paṭhanti - atha ya ime grāma iṣṭā-pūrte dattam ity upāsate te dhūmam abhisambhavanti
GE07bhg4c08u:1121: apara-pakṣādyān ṣaḍ-dakṣiṇaiti māsāṃs tān naite saṃvatsaram abhiprāpnuvanti || māsebhyaḥ pitṛ-lokaṃ pitṛ-lokād ākāśam ākāśāc candramasam eṣa somo rājā tad devānām annaṃ taṃ devā bhakṣayanti tasmin yavāt saṃpātam uṣitvāthaitam evādhvānaṃ punar nivartante (5.10.3-5) iti |
GE07bhg4c08u:1122: tathā ca dhūmādibhiḥ pareśa-nideśasthair aṣṭabhir devaiḥ pālitena pathā
GE07bhg4c08u:1123: kāmya-karmiṇaś candra-lokaṃ pāpya bhoga-kṣaye sati tasmāt punar nivartanta iti ||25||
GE07bhg4c08u:1125: śukla-kṛṣṇe gatī hy ete jagataḥ śāśvate mate |
GE07bhg4c08u:1131: jñāna-karmādhikāriṇo jagataḥ śāśvate anādī saṃmate saṃsārasyānāditvāt |
GE07bhg4c08u:1132: tayor ekayā śuklayā anāvṛttiṃ mokṣaṃ yāti |
GE07bhg4c08u:1134: madhusūdanaḥ - uktau mārgāv upasaṃharati śukla-kṛṣṇe iti |
GE07bhg4c08u:1138: te ete śukla-kṛṣṇe gatī mārgau hi prasiddhe
GE07bhg4c08u:1140: jagataḥ sarvasyāpi śāstra-jñasya śāśvate anādī mate saṃsārasyānāditvāt |
GE07bhg4c08u:1141: tayor ekayā śuklayā yāty anāvṛttiṃ kaścit
GE07bhg4c08u:1143: viśvanāthaḥ --- uktau mārgāv upasaṃharati śukla-kṛṣṇe iti |
GE07bhg4c08u:1145: ekayā śuklayā anāvṛttiṃ mokṣam anyayā kṛṣṇayā tu punaḥ punar atra jāyate ||26||
GE07bhg4c08u:1147: arcir-ādir gatiḥ śuklā prakāśa-mayatvāt dhūmādikā gatiḥ kṛṣṇā prakāśa-śūnyatvāt |
GE07bhg4c08u:1148: gatiḥ panthā ete gatā jñāna-karmādhikāriṇo jagataḥ śāśvate anādī sammate tasyānāditvāt
GE07bhg4c08u:1151: naite sṛtī pārtha jānan yogī muhyati kaścana |
GE07bhg4c08u:1153: śrīdharaḥ - mārga-jñāna-kalaṃ darśayan bhakti-yogam upasaṃharati naite iti
GE07bhg4c08u:1154: | ete sṛtī mārgau mokṣa-saṃsāra-prāpakau jānan kaścid api yogī na muhyati
GE07bhg4c08u:1158: madhusūdanaḥ - gater upāsyatvāya tad-vijñānaṃ stauti naite iti |
GE07bhg4c08u:1159: ete sṛtī mārgau he pārtha jana krama-mokṣāyaikā punaḥ saṃsārāyāpareti niścinvan
GE07bhg4c08u:1160: yogī dhyāna-niṣṭho na muhyati kevalaṃ karma dhūmādi-mārga-prāpakaṃ
GE07bhg4c08u:1161: kartavyatvena na pratyeti kaścana kaścid api |
GE07bhg4c08u:1168: baladevaḥ -- etayoḥ pathor bodho viveka-hetur bhavatīti taṃ stauti naita iti |
GE07bhg4c08u:1169: sṛtī panthāno jānan arcir-ādi-mokṣāya dhūmādiḥ saṃsārāyeti smaran
GE07bhg4c08u:1170: kaścid api yogī mad-bhakto na muhyati dhūmādi-prāpakaṃ karma kartavyatvena na niścinotīty arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:1173: vedeṣu yajñeṣu tapaḥsu caiva dāneṣu yat puṇyaphalaṃ |
GE07bhg4c08u:1174: atyeti tat sarvam idaṃ viditvā yogī paraṃ sthānam upaiti cādyam ||28||
GE07bhg4c08u:1175: śrīdharaḥ - adhyāyārtham aṣṭa-praśnārtha-nirṇayaṃ saphalam upasaṃharati vedeṣv iti |
GE07bhg4c08u:1184: kiṃ kṛtvā ? idam aṣṭa-praśnārtha-nirṇayenoktaṃ tattvaṃ viditvā |
GE07bhg4c08u:1185: tataś ca yogī jñānī bhūtvā param utkṛṣṭam ādyaṃ jagan mūla-bhūtaṃ
GE07bhg4c08u:1191: madhusūdanaḥ - punaḥ śraddhānu-vṛddhy-arthaṃ yogaṃ stauti vedeṣv iti |
GE07bhg4c08u:1195: dāneṣu tulā-puruṣādiṣu deśe kāle pātre ca śraddhayā samyag-dattesu
GE07bhg4c08u:1196: yat-puṇya-phalaṃ puṇyasya dharmasya phalaṃ svarga-svārājyādi pradiṣṭaṃ śāstreṇa |
GE07bhg4c08u:1197: atyety atikrāmati tat sarvam idaṃ pūrvokta-sapta-praśna-nirūpaṇa-dvāreṇoktaṃ viditvā
GE07bhg4c08u:1199: na kevalaṃ tad atikrāmati paraṃ sarvotkṛṣṭam aiśvaraṃ sthānam ādyaṃ
GE07bhg4c08u:1200: sarva-kāraṇam upaiti ca pratipadyate ca sarva-kāraṇaṃ brahmaiva prāpnotīty arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:1207: tat sarvam atyeti atikramya ca yogī bhaktimān tato 'pi śreṣṭhaṃ sthānam ādyam
GE07bhg4c08u:1209: bhaktānāṃ sarvataḥ śraiṣṭhyaṃ pūrvoktaṃ teṣv api sphuṭam |
GE07bhg4c08u:1217: dāneṣu deśa-kāla-pātra-parīkṣayā śraddhayā ca samyag-datteṣu yat puṇya-phalaṃ svarga-rājyādi-lakṣaṇaṃ pradiṣṭam uktam |
GE07bhg4c08u:1221: adhyāya-dvayoktaṃ bhagavato mama mad-bhakteś ca māhātmyaṃ sat-prasaṅgena
GE07bhg4c08u:1222: viditvā tad-vedana-sukhātiriktaṃ tat sarvaṃ tṛṇāya manyata ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:1223: tato yogī mad-bhaktimān bhūtvādyam anādi-parama-māyikaṃ mat-sthānam upaiti
